"@Shadow_the_Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5455c8ae63687215f1440100#post_5455c8ae63687215f1440100

i can assure you, any instance of me trying to sound superior to people are all jokes.

seriously, im literally a walking joke, dont take anything i say seriously.

i may be ignorant, a bad friend, lazy ass, incredibly annoying, have bad taste, incredibly uncouth, intolerant, but not a snobby asshole.

and if for some reason past me WAS a snobby asshole then i apologize if anything.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5455caf06368723908130100#post_5455caf06368723908130100

recommendations (yes i havent left yet give me a break)

1.dont look up anything on google, go to the wiki or wait for recaps if you feel something felt up.
2.dont search for fan art, most of them containt spoilers, since there is lots of twists.
3.read everything, every pesterlog, every intermission, watch every flash, dont miss on anything.
4.homestuck starts a bit stale, mundane even, if you are the type that likes the action to start fast then guess its not for you.
5.again, dotn skip anything, missing even 1 page can make you lose everything.
6.its not suppose to make sense all the time, some stuff just happens cause it happens.
